item.title: Sarah add a quote by Anna Godbersen
item.description: "As she always did on any really important day, Penelope Hayes wore red." -- Anna Godbersen

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Julia Quinn
item.description: "You always get more respect when you don't have a happy ending." -- Julia Quinn

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Edna St. Vincent Millay
item.description: "They say when you are missing someone that they are probably feeling the same, but I don't think it's possible for you to miss me as much as I'm missing you right now" -- Edna St. Vincent Millay

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Edna St. Vincent Millay
item.description: "Where you used to be, there is a hole in the world, which I find myself constantly walking around in the daytime, and falling in at night. I miss you like hell." -- Edna St. Vincent Millay

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Edna St. Vincent Millay
item.description: "A person who publishes a book willfully appears before the populace with his pants down. If it is a good book nothing can hurt him. If it is a bad book nothing can help him." -- Edna St. Vincent Millay
